label: PathHierarchyTokenizerV2
description: Tokenizer for path-like hierarchies. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Delimiter
fields.tooltip: The delimiter character to use. Default is "/".

fields.label: Replacement
fields.tooltip: A value that, if set, replaces the delimiter character. Default is "/".

fields.label: Reverse
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to generate tokens in reverse order. Default is false.

fields.label: Skip
fields.tooltip: The number of initial tokens to skip. Default is 0.

fields.label: Max Token Length
fields.tooltip: The maximum token length. Default and maximum is 300.
